events.name: Conversations w/ Van Cleef & Arpels : Discovering the Art & Science of Gems
events.description:
Join us in this illuminating discussion about the gemology and artistry behind our new exhibition, Van Cleef & Arpels: The Art and Science of Gems. With anecdotes and insights from Van Cleef & Arpels President and CEO Nicolas Bos and a panel discussion with Heritage Director, Catherine Cariou, Mus√©um national d'Histoire naturelle (French National Museum of Natural History) President, Professor Bruno David and Poet, Author and Editor, Alvin Pang - Poet, Author, Editor.

Venue: Expression Gallery, Level 4, ArtScience Museum
Free admission. Register in the Lobby.
